name: Chick And Giant
description: Hi, everyone! Welcome to the world of a chick and giant! The chick lives happily in its small world until one day a giant comes and makes that small world upside down. It is a puzzle game consist of 5 stages . All you have to do is move the chick to the exit point! Try to combine the elements in the world to see what will happen! Have fun! It's me and @VVVV first LD jam, we did it! And it feels amazing to take part in this event! Hope you enjoy our game, if you have any comment, we are ready to hear!
